r body asked could she live with her "own" family intil she return to the a=
fterlife..the theory is it was to get the girl out the house because she wa=
s being abused..so what your hearing is like the house replaying the aweful=
 events..
=C2=A0
This is a residual haunting not a active one..so yes i agr=
ee they are not there together however the "house" like a tape recorder is =
replaying the events..the part when she says "why don't you love me" makes =
my stomach turn to knots..in the beginning you can hear actually sounds of =
maoning like umm sex sounds
